verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the LORD. <S%H3050><s%> Sing <S%H7891><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song, <S%H7892><s%> and his praise <S%H8416><s%> in the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of saints. <S%H2623><s%>
Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in him that made <S%H6213><s%> him: let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> be joyful <S%H1523><s%> in their King. <S%H4428><s%>
Let them praise <S%H1984><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in the dance: <S%H4234><s%> let them sing <S%H2167><s%> praises to him with the tambourine <S%H8596><s%> and harp. <S%H3658><s%>
For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> takes pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in his people: <S%H5971><s%> he will beautify <S%H6286><s%> the meek <S%H6035><s%> with salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
Let the saints <S%H2623><s%> be joyful <S%H5937><s%> in glory: <S%H3519><s%> let them sing <S%H7442><s%> aloud <S%H7442><s%> on their beds. <S%H4904><s%>
Let the high <S%H7319><s%> praises of God <S%H410><s%> be in their mouth, <S%H1627><s%> and a two-edged <S%H6374><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> in their hand; <S%H3027><s%>
To execute <S%H6213><s%> vengeance <S%H5360><s%> on the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and punishments <S%H5771><s%> on the people; <S%H3816><s%>
To bind <S%H631><s%> their kings <S%H4428><s%> with chains, <S%H2131><s%> and their nobles <S%H3513><s%> with fetters <S%H3525><s%> of iron; <S%H1270><s%>

To execute <S%H6213><s%> on them the judgment <S%H4941><s%> written: <S%H3789><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> honor <S%H1926><s%> have all <S%H3605><s%> his saints. <S%H2623><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the LORD. <S%H3050><s%>
